title: US - Phylogenetic approaches to network analysis.
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: No economic or social impact as yet.
findingsText: This funding has supported the development of advanced methods for the study of the evolution of cellular systems, in particular how interactions between proteins can be related to each other via the duplication and subsequent divergence of genes. Our methods will be of use in the field of evolutionary systems biology and for extrapolating results obtained from model organisms to other species. Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
